availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Paris, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Eveline Talbott on May 30, 1848. Father of Charles L. Hanson. Attorney in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Paris in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 269; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris, p. 19; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris, Ward 2, p. 4; Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Bourbon County, Kentucky, May 30, 1848; Find A Grave, "Richard Hickman Hanson (1819-1893)," Memorial #98428631, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=98428631 (accessed August 18, 2017).
